title: HAnS
description:
HAnS (Helping Annotate Software) is an open-source (Apache 2.0) IntelliJ plugin that simplifies feature annotation.
HAnS provides autocompletion, quick fixes, a feature model view, and a metrics view (lines of feature code, scattering degree, tangling degree, and annotated files). HAnS is programming language-agnostic.

title: HAnS-Viz
description:
HAnS-Viz is an open-source (Apache 2.0) IntelliJ plugin that extends HAnS by visualising feature traceability.
HAnS-Viz provides several graphs that visualises the embedded traceability links created with HAnS.
